00048 CdcIonSD::CdcIonSD(G4String name, MyVGeometryParameter* pointer)
00049 :MySD(name, pointer), hitsCollection(0)
00050 {
00051   m_GeometryParameter= dynamic_cast<CdcGeometryParameter*> (pointer);
00052   if (!m_GeometryParameter){
00053 //              std::cout<<"In CdcIonSD::CdcIonSD, cannot get CdcGeometryParameter pointer!!!"<<std::endl;
00054     G4Exception("CdcIonSD::CdcIonSD()",
00055         "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00056         "cannot get CdcGeometryParameter pointer");
00057   }
00058 
00059         //name of related Digiteizer module
00060 //  CdcDigitizer* cdcDM = new CdcDigitizer("CdcDigitizer");
00061 //      MyDetectorManager::GetMyDetectorManager()->RegistorDM("CdcDigitizer");
00062 //  G4DigiManager::GetDMpointer()->AddNewModule(cdcDM);
00063 
00064         //define fTolerance
00065         fTolerance = 2.2E-13;
00066 }
00067 
00068 CdcIonSD::~CdcIonSD(){
00069 }

00071 //-----------------------------------Initialize----------------------------------------------
00072 //Will be called by geant4 automatically at the beginning of each event
00073 void CdcIonSD::Initialize(G4HCofThisEvent* HCE)
00074 {
00075         hitsCollection = new CdcIonHitsCollection
00076                 (SensitiveDetectorName,collectionName[0]);
00077 //      std::cout<<"====>In CdcIonSD::Initialize(), created hitsCollection at ("<<(void*)hitsCollection<<std::endl;
00078         G4int HCID = -1;
00079         HCID = G4SDManager::GetSDMpointer()->GetCollectionID(collectionName[0]);
00080         if ( HCID < 0 ){
00081                 G4Exception("CdcIonSD::Initialize()",
00082                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00083                                 "Cann not find hitsCollection of this event");
00084         }
00085         HCE->AddHitsCollection( HCID, hitsCollection );
00086         int LayerNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_LayerNo();
00087         hitPointer.resize(LayerNo);
00088         hitTime.resize(LayerNo);
00089         for( int  i = 0; i < LayerNo; i++ ){
00090                 int CellNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_cell_num(i);
00091                 hitPointer[i].resize(CellNo);
00092                 hitTime[i].resize(CellNo);
00093                 for( int j = 0; j < CellNo; j++ ){
00094                         hitPointer[i][j] = -1;
00095                         hitTime[i][j] = -tres*2;
00096                 }
00097         }
00098   //initialize for root objects
00099   cdc_nHits = 0;
00100   m_x.clear();
00101   m_y.clear();
00102   m_z.clear();
00103   m_t.clear();
00104   m_px.clear();
00105   m_py.clear();
00106   m_pz.clear();
00107   m_pa.clear();
00108   m_e.clear();
00109   m_ccol.clear();
00110   m_edep.clear();
00111   m_layerID.clear();
00112   m_cellID.clear();
00113   m_tid.clear();
00114   m_pid.clear();
00115   //initialize for filter
00116   nTracks = 0;
00117   prevTrackID = -100;
00118 }

00120 //-----------------------------------SetBranch----------------------------------------------
00121 //Should be called at the beginning of each run (now in MyAnalysisSvc::BeginOfRunAction())
00122 void CdcIonSD::SetBranch(){
00123         MyRoot* myRoot = MyRoot::GetMyRoot();
00124         G4String volName = get_VolName();
00125   if( flag_nHits ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_nHits", &cdc_nHits);
00126   if( flag_x ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_x", &m_x);
00127   if( flag_y ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_y", &m_y);
00128   if( flag_z ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_z", &m_z);
00129   if( flag_t ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_t", &m_t);
00130   if( flag_px ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_px", &m_px);
00131   if( flag_py ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_py", &m_py);
00132   if( flag_pz ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pz", &m_pz);
00133   if( flag_pa ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pa", &m_pa);
00134   if( flag_e ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_e", &m_e);
00135   if( flag_ccol ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_ccol", &m_ccol);
00136   if( flag_edep ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_edep", &m_edep);
00137   if( flag_layerID ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_layerID", &m_layerID);
00138   if( flag_cellID ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_cellID", &m_cellID);
00139   if( flag_tid ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_tid", &m_tid);
00140   if( flag_pid ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pid", &m_pid);
00141 }

00143 //-----------------------------------ReadOutputCard----------------------------------------------
00144 //Should be called before the begin of each run (now in the constructor of MyAnalysisSvc)
00145 void CdcIonSD::ReadOutputCard(G4String filename){
00146         ReSet();
00147         G4String volName = get_VolName();
00148         std::ifstream fin_card(filename);
00149         if(!fin_card){
00150                 std::cout<<"In CdcIonSD::ReadOutputCard, cannot open "<<filename<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00151     G4Exception("CdcIonSD::ReadOutputCard()",
00152         "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00153         "cannot find output card");
00154         }
00155         std::stringstream buf_card;
00156         std::string s_card;
00157         int n_output_section_symbol = 0;
00158         int n_filter_section_symbol = 0;
00159         G4String BRANCHSECTIONNAME = volName + "_SECTION";
00160         G4String FILTERSECTIONNAME = volName + "_FILTERSECTION";
00161         while(getline(fin_card,s_card)){
00162                 buf_card.str("");
00163                 buf_card.clear();
00164                 buf_card<<s_card;
00165 
00166                 //eleminate useless lines
00167     const char* c_card = s_card.c_str();
00168     int length = strlen(c_card);
00169     int offset = 0;
00170     for ( ; offset < length; offset++ ){
00171       if ( c_card[offset] != ' ' ) break;
00172     }
00173     if ( c_card[offset] == '#' || (c_card[offset] == '/' && c_card[offset+1] == '/') || length - offset == 0 ){
00174         continue;
00175     }
00176 
00177                 std::string name;
00178                 buf_card>>name;
00179                 if ( n_output_section_symbol == 0 ){
00180                         if ( name == BRANCHSECTIONNAME ){
00181                                 n_output_section_symbol++;
00182                         }
00183                 }
00184                 else if ( n_output_section_symbol == 1 ){
00185                         if ( name == BRANCHSECTIONNAME ){
00186                                 n_output_section_symbol++;
00187                         }
00188                         else if( name == "nHits" ) flag_nHits = true;
00189                         else if( name == "x" ) {flag_x = true; buf_card>>unitName_x; unit_x = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_x);}
00190                         else if( name == "y" ) {flag_y = true; buf_card>>unitName_y; unit_y = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_y);}
00191                         else if( name == "z" ) {flag_z = true; buf_card>>unitName_z; unit_z = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_z);}
00192                         else if( name == "t" ) {flag_t = true; buf_card>>unitName_t; unit_t = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_t);}
00193                         else if( name == "px" ) {flag_px = true; buf_card>>unitName_px; unit_px = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_px);}
00194                         else if( name == "py" ) {flag_py = true; buf_card>>unitName_py; unit_py = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_py);}
00195                         else if( name == "pz" ) {flag_pz = true; buf_card>>unitName_pz; unit_pz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pz);}
00196                         else if( name == "pa" ) {flag_pa = true; buf_card>>unitName_pa; unit_pa = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pa);}
00197                         else if( name == "e" ) {flag_e = true; buf_card>>unitName_e; unit_e = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_e);}
00198                         else if( name == "ccol" ) {flag_ccol = true; buf_card>>unitName_ccol; unit_ccol = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_ccol);}
00199                         else if( name == "edep" ) {flag_edep = true; buf_card>>unitName_edep; unit_edep = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_edep);}
00200                         else if( name == "cellID" ) flag_cellID = true;
00201                         else if( name == "layerID" ) flag_layerID = true;
00202                         else if( name == "tid" ) flag_tid = true;
00203                         else if( name == "pid" ) flag_pid = true;
00204                         else{
00205                           std::cout<<"In CdcIonSD::ReadOutputCard, unknown name: "<<name<<" in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00206                                 std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00207                         }
00208                 }
00209 
00210                 if ( n_filter_section_symbol == 0 ){
00211                         if ( name == FILTERSECTIONNAME ){
00212                                 n_filter_section_symbol++;
00213                         }
00214                 }
00215                 else if ( n_filter_section_symbol == 1 ){
00216                         if ( name == FILTERSECTIONNAME ){
00217                                 n_filter_section_symbol++;
00218                         }
00219                         else if( name == "Switch" ) Switch = true;
00220                         else if( name == "maxn" ) buf_card>>maxn;
00221                         else if( name == "ntracks" ) buf_card>>ntracks;
00222                         else{
00223                                 G4double para;
00224                                 std::string unit;
00225                                 buf_card>>para>>unit;
00226                                 para *= MyString2Anything::get_U(unit);
00227                                 if( name == "minC" ) minC = para;
00228                                 else if( name == "mint" ) mint = para;
00229                                 else if( name == "maxt" ) maxt = para;
00230                                 else if( name == "tres" ) tres = para;
00231                                 else{
00232                                         std::cout<<"In CdcIonSD::ReadOutputCard, unknown name: "<<name<<" in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00233                                         std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00234                                 }
00235                         }
00236                 }
00237 
00238                 if ( n_output_section_symbol > 1 && n_filter_section_symbol > 1 ){
00239                         break;
00240                 }
00241         }
00242         buf_card.str("");
00243         buf_card.clear();
00244         if ( n_output_section_symbol <= 1 ){
00245           std::cout<<"*****************WARNING********************"<<std::endl;
00246                 std::cout<<"In CdcIonSD::ReadOutputCard, failed to find enough section seperators for output in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00247                 std::cout<<"Will use default settings."<<std::endl;
00248                 std::cout<<"********************************************"<<std::endl;
00249         }
00250         if ( n_filter_section_symbol<= 1 ){
00251           std::cout<<"*****************WARNING********************"<<std::endl;
00252                 std::cout<<"In CdcIonSD::ReadOutputCard, failed to find enough section seperators for filter in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00253                 std::cout<<"Will use default settings."<<std::endl;
00254                 std::cout<<"********************************************"<<std::endl;
00255         }
00256         fin_card.close();
00257         ShowOutCard();
00258 }
00259 
00260 //-----------------------------------ReSet----------------------------------------------
00261 //Private
00262 void CdcIonSD::ReSet(){
00263   //default output set
00264   flag_nHits = false;
00265   flag_x = false;
00266   flag_y = false;
00267   flag_z = false;
00268   flag_t = false;
00269   flag_px = false;
00270   flag_py = false;
00271   flag_pz = false;
00272   flag_pa = false;
00273   flag_e = false;
00274   flag_ccol = false;
00275   flag_edep = false;
00276   flag_cellID = false;
00277   flag_layerID = false;
00278   flag_tid = false;
00279   flag_pid = false;
00280   //for fileter
00281   Switch = false;
00282   minC = 1;
00283   maxn = 1000;
00284   ntracks = 1;
00285   mint = 0;
00286   maxt = 0;
00287   tres = 0;
00288 }

00290 //-----------------------------------ShowOutCard----------------------------------------------
00291 //Private
00292 void CdcIonSD::ShowOutCard(){
00293         std::cout<<"*************************Output settings for "<<get_VolName()<<"***************************"<<std::endl;
00294   //default output set
00295   std::cout<<"output nHits?  "<<(flag_nHits?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00296   std::cout<<"output x?      "<<(flag_x?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_x<<std::endl;
00297   std::cout<<"output y?      "<<(flag_y?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_y<<std::endl;
00298   std::cout<<"output z?      "<<(flag_z?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_z<<std::endl;
00299   std::cout<<"output t?      "<<(flag_t?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_t<<std::endl;
00300   std::cout<<"output px?     "<<(flag_px?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_px<<std::endl;
00301   std::cout<<"output py?     "<<(flag_py?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_py<<std::endl;
00302   std::cout<<"output pz?     "<<(flag_pz?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_pz<<std::endl;
00303   std::cout<<"output pa?     "<<(flag_pa?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_pa<<std::endl;
00304   std::cout<<"output e?      "<<(flag_e?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_e<<std::endl;
00305   std::cout<<"output ccol?   "<<(flag_ccol?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_ccol<<std::endl;
00306   std::cout<<"output edep?   "<<(flag_edep?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_edep<<std::endl;
00307   std::cout<<"output layerID?"<<(flag_layerID?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00308   std::cout<<"output cellID? "<<(flag_cellID?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00309   std::cout<<"output tid?    "<<(flag_tid?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00310   std::cout<<"output pid?    "<<(flag_pid?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00311   //for fileter
00312   std::cout<<"Switch on?     "<<(Switch?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00313   std::cout<<"minC =         "<<minC/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00314   std::cout<<"maxn =         "<<maxn<<std::endl;
00315   std::cout<<"ntracks =      "<<ntracks<<std::endl;
00316   std::cout<<"mint =         "<<mint/ns<<"ns"<<std::endl;
00317   std::cout<<"maxt =         "<<maxt/ns<<"ns"<<std::endl;
00318         std::cout<<"******************************************************************************"<<std::endl;
00319 }
00320 
00321 //-----------------------------------ProcessHits----------------------------------------------
00322 //Will be called by geant4 automatically everytime a step in CdcIonSD generated
00323 G4bool CdcIonSD::ProcessHits(G4Step* aStep,G4TouchableHistory* touchableHistory)
00324 {
00325 
00326 //*************************get useful variables***********************
00327 
00328         int status;
00329         // get track info
00330   G4Track* gTrack = aStep->GetTrack() ;
00331   G4int trackID= gTrack->GetTrackID(); //G4 track ID of current track.
00332   G4double globalT=gTrack->GetGlobalTime();//Time since the event in which the track belongs is created
00333   G4int charge = gTrack->GetDefinition()->GetPDGCharge();
00334   G4int pid = gTrack->GetDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding();
00335   G4double theta = gTrack->GetMomentumDirection().theta();
00336 
00337   // get information at the beginning and at the end of step
00338   G4StepPoint* prePoint  = aStep->GetPreStepPoint() ;
00339   G4StepPoint* postPoint = aStep->GetPostStepPoint() ;
00340         G4double total_e = prePoint->GetTotalEnergy();
00341         G4ThreeVector pointIn_mom = prePoint->GetMomentum();
00342         G4double pointIn_pa = pointIn_mom.mag();
00343   G4ThreeVector pointIn_pos = prePoint->GetPosition();
00344   G4ThreeVector pointOut_pos = postPoint->GetPosition();
00345   G4double pointIn_time = prePoint->GetGlobalTime();//Time since the event in which the track belongs is created
00346 
00347   // get step info
00348   G4double edep = aStep->GetTotalEnergyDeposit();
00349 
00350   // get layerId and cellId
00351   const G4VTouchable *touchable = prePoint->GetTouchable();
00352   G4int ReplicaNo = touchable->GetVolume(0)->GetCopyNo();
00353   G4int layerId, cellId;
00354   status = m_GeometryParameter->get_layerIdcellId(ReplicaNo, &layerId, &cellId);
00355   if(status){
00356                 std::cout<<"In CdcIonSD::ProcessHits(), unknown ReplicaNo = "<<ReplicaNo<<"!!! Will not generate hit"<<std::endl;
00357                 return false;
00358   }
00359 
00360         //fieldVal means the field value at pointIn_pos
00361         G4double fieldVal[3];
00362         G4double point[4];
00363         point[0] = pointIn_pos.x();
00364         point[1] = pointIn_pos.y();
00365         point[2] = pointIn_pos.z();
00366         point[3] = pointIn_time;
00367         const G4Field* field = G4TransportationManager::GetTransportationManager()->GetFieldManager()->GetDetectorField();
00368         field->GetFieldValue(point, fieldVal);
00369         G4ThreeVector Bfield(fieldVal[0], fieldVal[1], fieldVal[2]);
00370 
00371 //*************************filter***********************
00372         //switch
00373         if (!Switch) return false;
00374 
00375   //ntracks
00376   if ( trackID != prevTrackID ){
00377     prevTrackID = trackID;
00378     nTracks++;
00379   }
00380         if ( nTracks > ntracks && ntracks) return false;
00381 
00382         //maxn
00383         if ( maxn && cdc_nHits >= maxn ) return false;
00384 
00385   //minC
00386         if ( minC && pointIn_pa < minC ) return false;
00387 
00388         //time_window
00389   if(isnan(globalT)){
00390     G4cout<<"CdcIonSD:error, globalT is nan "<<G4endl;
00391     return false;
00392   }
00393   if ( globalT < mint && mint ) return false;
00394   if ( globalT > maxt && maxt ) return false;
00395 
00396         //secondaries
00397         // suppose there would be 10 electrons in this step
00398         int nSec = 100;
00399 
00400 //*************************calculate drift time and colected charge****************************
00401         G4ThreeVector hitPosition(0.,0.,0.);
00402         G4double driftD = 0;
00403         CalculateHitInfo(hitPosition,driftD,pointIn_pos,pointOut_pos,pointIn_mom,Bfield,layerId,cellId,charge,nSec);
00404         G4double driftT = 0;//should be calculated in future
00405         G4double ccol = 0;//should be calculated in future
00406         G4double hit_time = pointIn_time;
00407 
00408         //*******************generate or modify hit************************
00409         //tres
00410         //look for last hit in the same volume.
00411         G4int index = -1;
00412         G4double dt;
00413         if ( hitPointer[layerId][cellId] == -1 ){
00414         dt = tres*2.;
00415         }
00416         else{
00417                 dt = hit_time - hitTime[layerId][cellId];
00418         }
00419 
00420         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00421                 std::cout<<"in layer["<<layerId<<"], track ["<<trackID<<"] hit cell["<<cellId<<"]"<<std::endl;
00422         }
00423         if (dt >= tres){
00424                 CdcIonHit* newHit = new CdcIonHit();
00425                 newHit->SetTrackID(trackID);
00426                 newHit->SetLayerNo(layerId);
00427                 newHit->SetCellNo(cellId);
00428                 newHit->SetEdep(edep);
00429                 newHit->SetCcol(ccol);
00430                 newHit->SetPos(hitPosition);
00431                 newHit->SetTheta(theta);
00432                 newHit->SetPosFlag(0);
00433                 newHit->SetEnterAngle(0);
00434                 newHit->SetDriftT (driftT);
00435                 newHit->SetGlobalT(globalT);
00436                 hitsCollection->insert(newHit);
00437                 G4int NbHits = hitsCollection->entries();
00438                 hitPointer[layerId][cellId]=NbHits-1;
00439                 hitTime[layerId][cellId]=hit_time;
00440                 //Set for root objects
00441                 if(flag_x) m_x.push_back(hitPosition.x()/unit_x);
00442                 if(flag_y) m_y.push_back(hitPosition.y()/unit_y);
00443                 if(flag_z) m_z.push_back(hitPosition.z()/unit_z);
00444                 if(flag_t) m_t.push_back(globalT/unit_t);
00445                 if(flag_px) m_px.push_back(pointIn_mom.x()/unit_px);
00446                 if(flag_py) m_py.push_back(pointIn_mom.y()/unit_py);
00447                 if(flag_pz) m_pz.push_back(pointIn_mom.z()/unit_pz);
00448                 if(flag_e) m_e.push_back(total_e/unit_e);
00449                 if(flag_ccol) m_ccol.push_back(ccol/unit_ccol);
00450                 if(flag_edep) m_edep.push_back(edep/unit_edep);
00451                 if(flag_layerID) m_layerID.push_back(layerId);
00452                 if(flag_cellID) m_cellID.push_back(cellId);
00453                 if(flag_tid) m_tid.push_back(trackID);
00454                 if(flag_pid) m_pid.push_back(pid);
00455                 cdc_nHits++;
00456         }
00457         else{
00458                 G4int pointer=hitPointer[layerId][cellId];
00459                 G4double edepTemp = (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->GetEdep();
00460                 G4double ccolTemp = (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->GetCcol();
00461                 (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetEdep(edepTemp  + edep);
00462                 (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetCcol(ccolTemp  + ccol);
00463                 if(flag_edep) m_edep[pointer] = (edepTemp + edep)/unit_edep;
00464                 if(flag_ccol) m_ccol[pointer] = (ccolTemp + ccol)/unit_ccol;
00465                 G4double preDriftT = (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->GetDriftT();
00466                 if (driftT < preDriftT) {
00467                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetTrackID(trackID);
00468                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetDriftT(driftT);
00469                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetPos(hitPosition);
00470                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetGlobalT(globalT);
00471                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetTheta(theta);
00472                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetPosFlag(0);
00473                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetEnterAngle(0);
00474                         //Set for root objects
00475                         if(flag_x) m_x[pointer] = hitPosition.x()/unit_x;
00476                         if(flag_y) m_y[pointer] = hitPosition.y()/unit_y;
00477                         if(flag_z) m_z[pointer] = hitPosition.z()/unit_z;
00478                         if(flag_t) m_t[pointer] = globalT/unit_t;
00479                         if(flag_px) m_px[pointer] = pointIn_mom.x()/unit_px;
00480                         if(flag_py) m_py[pointer] = pointIn_mom.y()/unit_py;
00481                         if(flag_pz) m_pz[pointer] = pointIn_mom.z()/unit_pz;
00482                         if(flag_e) m_e[pointer] = total_e/unit_e;
00483                         if(flag_layerID) m_layerID[pointer] = layerId;
00484                         if(flag_cellID) m_cellID[pointer] = cellId;
00485                         if(flag_tid) m_tid[pointer] = trackID;
00486                         if(flag_pid) m_pid[pointer] = pid;
00487                 }
00488         }
00489   return true;
00490 }
00491 
00492 //-----------------------------------EndOfEvent----------------------------------------------
00493 //Will be called by geant4 automatically at the end of each event
00494 void CdcIonSD::EndOfEvent(G4HCofThisEvent*){
00495   if (verboseLevel>0) {
00496 //    hitsCollection->PrintAllHits();
00497     /*
00498        G4int NbHits = hitsCollection->entries();
00499        G4cout << "\n-------->Hits Collection: in this event they are " << NbHits
00500        << " hits in the CDC chambers: " << G4endl;
00501        for (G4int i=0;i<NbHits;i++) (*hitsCollection)[i]->Print();
00502      */
00503   }
00504 }
00505 
00506 //-----------------------------------CalculateHitInfo----------------------------------------------
00507 //private
00508 int CdcIonSD::CalculateHitInfo(G4ThreeVector &hitPosition, double &driftD, G4ThreeVector pointIn_pos, G4ThreeVector pointOut_pos, G4ThreeVector pointIn_mom, G4ThreeVector Bfield, int layerId, int cellId, int charge, int nSec){
00509 
00510         //Get position of signal wire
00511         G4double wire_pos_R, wire_pos_phi;
00512         G4double alpha = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_angle4rotate(layerId)/2;
00513         wire_pos_R = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_RMid(layerId)*cos(alpha/2);
00514         wire_pos_phi = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_cell_phi(layerId, cellId);
00515         G4ThreeVector wire_pos(1.,1.,1.);
00516         wire_pos.setMag(wire_pos_R);
00517         wire_pos.setTheta(pi/2);
00518         wire_pos.setPhi(wire_pos_phi-alpha);//careful with the sign
00519         G4double layer_halfzlen = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_length(layerId)/2.; //In Geant4, soild has central-symmetry 
00520         G4double alpha_RMid = alpha/2;
00521         G4double wire_theta = atan(wire_pos_R*sin(alpha_RMid)/layer_halfzlen);
00522         G4ThreeVector wire_direction(1.,1.,1.);
00523         wire_direction.setMag(1.);
00524         wire_direction.setPhi(wire_pos_phi+ (alpha>0?pi/2:-pi/2));
00525         wire_direction.setTheta(wire_theta);
00526         wire_direction = wire_direction.unit();//r=0? self : unit 
00527 
00528         G4ThreeVector B_direction = Bfield.unit();
00529         G4double B_amplitude = Bfield.mag();
00530         G4double pT = (pointIn_mom.cross(B_direction)).mag();
00531 
00532         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00533                 std::cout<<"  position of pointIn(rho,phi,z):"<<pointIn_pos.rho()/cm<<"cm, "<<pointIn_pos.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<pointIn_pos.z()/cm<<"cm"<<std::endl;
00534                 std::cout<<"  position of pointOut(rho,phi,z):"<<pointOut_pos.rho()/cm<<"cm, "<<pointOut_pos.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<pointOut_pos.z()/cm<<"cm"<<std::endl;
00535                 std::cout<<"  B(phi, theta, B): "<<B_direction.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<B_direction.theta()/deg<<"deg, "<<B_amplitude/tesla<<"T"<<std::endl;
00536                 std::cout<<"  momentum of pointIn(r,theta,phi):"<<pointIn_mom.mag()/MeV<<"MeV, "<<pointIn_mom.theta()/deg<<"deg, "<<pointIn_mom.phi()/deg<<"deg, pT = "<<pT/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00537                 std::cout<<"  position of wire(rho,phi,z):"<<wire_pos.rho()/cm<<"cm, "<<wire_pos.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<wire_pos.z()/cm<<"cm"<<std::endl;
00538                 std::cout<<"  direction of wire(theta, phi):"<<wire_direction.theta()/deg<<"deg, "<<wire_direction.phi()/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00539         }
00540 
00541         //************************************1, r = 0******************************
00542         // the track is a line
00543         //calculate the distance between two straight lines
00544         if ( B_amplitude == 0 || pT == 0 || charge == 0 ){
00545                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00546                         std::cout<<"  => r_helix = 0"<<std::endl;
00547                 }
00548                 G4ThreeVector mom_direction = pointIn_mom.unit();
00549                 if (mom_direction.mag()==0){
00550                         std::cout<<"WARNING!!! In CdcSD::FindClosestPoint(), momentum is zero!"<<std::endl;
00551                         return 1;
00552                 }
00553                 G4double theta = mom_direction.theta(wire_direction);
00554                 G4ThreeVector w2PI = pointIn_pos - wire_pos;
00555                 G4double DpI = (w2PI - w2PI.dot(wire_direction)*wire_direction ).mag();
00556                 if (theta == 0){
00557                         //Special case!
00558                         //-----------PI--------PO------
00559                         //           |
00560                         //-----C-----D------------------
00561                         hitPosition = pointIn_pos + ( pointOut_pos - pointIn_pos )*G4UniformRand();
00562                         driftD = DpI;
00563                         return 0;
00564                 }
00565                 //Normal case!
00566                 //----------------PI--------PO------
00567                 //-          | Theta != 0          +
00568                 //-----C-----D----------------------
00569                 G4double d = (mom_direction.cross(wire_direction)).dot(w2PI);
00570                 G4double lI = sqrt(DpI*DpI-d*d)/sin(theta);
00571                 G4ThreeVector w2PO = pointOut_pos - wire_pos;
00572                 G4double DpO = (w2PO - w2PO.dot(wire_direction)*wire_direction ).mag();
00573                 G4double lO = sqrt(DpO*DpO-d*d)/sin(theta);
00574                 G4ThreeVector point1 = pointIn_pos + lI*mom_direction;
00575                 G4ThreeVector point2 = pointIn_pos - lI*mom_direction;
00576                 G4ThreeVector w2P1 = point1 - wire_pos;
00577                 G4ThreeVector w2P2 = point2 - wire_pos;
00578                 G4double D1 = (w2P1 - w2P1.dot(wire_direction)*wire_direction ).mag();
00579                 G4double D2 = (w2P2 - w2P2.dot(wire_direction)*wire_direction ).mag();
00580                 bool Moving_Toward_Center = (D1 < D2);
00581                 if (Moving_Toward_Center) lI *= -1;
00582                 point1 = pointOut_pos - lO*mom_direction;
00583                 point2 = pointOut_pos + lO*mom_direction;
00584                 w2P1 = point1 - wire_pos;
00585                 w2P2 = point2 - wire_pos;
00586                 D1 = (w2P1 - w2P1.dot(wire_direction)*wire_direction).mag();
00587                 D2 = (w2P2 - w2P2.dot(wire_direction)*wire_direction).mag();
00588                 bool Moved_Passed_Center = (D1 < D2);
00589                 if (!Moved_Passed_Center) lO *= -1;
00590                 double lmin = 1e10; 
00591                 for ( int i = 0; i < nSec; i++ ){
00592                         double li = lI + (lO-lI)*G4UniformRand();
00593                         if ( fabs(li) < fabs(lmin) ) lmin = li;
00594                 }
00595                 double lsin = lmin*sin(theta);
00596                 driftD = sqrt(d*d+lsin*lsin);
00597                 hitPosition = pointIn_pos + ( lmin - lI )*mom_direction;
00598         }
00599 
00600         //***********************2, r = !0 && B_direction parallels wire******************************
00601         else if ( B_direction.isParallel(wire_direction, fTolerance) ){
00602                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00603                         std::cout<<"  => B_direction parallels wire"<<std::endl;
00604                 }
00605                 //rotate z to wire direction
00606                 G4double theta4rotate = wire_direction.theta();
00607                 G4ThreeVector axis4rotate = (wire_direction.cross(G4ThreeVector(0,0,1))).unit();
00608                 if (axis4rotate.mag() == 0){
00609                         axis4rotate = G4ThreeVector(0., 0., 1.);
00610                 }
00611                 B_direction.rotate(axis4rotate, theta4rotate);
00612                 wire_pos.rotate(axis4rotate, theta4rotate);
00613                 pointIn_pos.rotate(axis4rotate, theta4rotate);
00614                 pointOut_pos.rotate(axis4rotate, theta4rotate);
00615                 pointIn_mom.rotate(axis4rotate, theta4rotate);
00616                 //now wire_pos is the position of the projection of pointIn on the wire
00617                 wire_pos.setZ(pointIn_pos.z());
00618 
00619                 //pIC_D means the vector from pointIn to the centre of the curvature
00620                 //pOC_D means the vector from pointOut to the centre of the curvature
00621                 G4ThreeVector pTxBu_vec = pointIn_mom.cross(B_direction);
00622                 pTxBu_vec.setMag(pT);
00623                 G4ThreeVector pIC_D = (pTxBu_vec/eV) / (B_amplitude/tesla) / charge / (c_light/(m/s)) * m;
00624                 G4ThreeVector pOC_D = ( pointIn_pos + pIC_D ) - pointOut_pos;
00625 
00626                 //wC_D means the vector from wire_pos to centre of the curvature
00627                 G4ThreeVector wC_D = ( pointIn_pos + pIC_D ) - wire_pos;
00628 
00629                 std::cout<<"pIC_D @ phi = "<<pIC_D.phi()/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00630                 G4double phi_in = pIC_D.phi();
00631                 if (phi_in<0) phi_in += 360.*deg;
00632                 std::cout<<"phi_in = "<<phi_in/deg<<std::endl;
00633                 G4double phi_out = pOC_D.phi();
00634                 if (phi_out<0) phi_out += 360.*deg;
00635                 std::cout<<"phi_out = "<<phi_out/deg<<std::endl;
00636                 G4double phi_w = wC_D.phi();
00637                 if (phi_w<0) phi_w += 360.*deg;
00638                 std::cout<<"phi_w = "<<phi_w/deg<<std::endl;
00639                 double phi_hit = 180.*deg + phi_w - 1e-10;
00640                 for ( int i = 0; i < nSec; i++ ){
00641                         double phi = phi_in + ( phi_out - phi_in )*G4UniformRand();
00642                         double delta_phi = StandardDeltaAngle(phi-phi_w);
00643                         double delta_phi_min = StandardDeltaAngle(phi_hit-phi_w);
00644                         std::cout<<"    Sec["<<i<<"]: phi = "<<phi/deg<<"deg, delta_phi = "<<delta_phi/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00645                         if ( fabs(phi - phi_w) < fabs(phi_hit - phi_w) ){
00646                                 std::cout<<"      smaller than "<<phi_hit/deg<<" - "<<phi_w/deg<<" = "<<delta_phi_min/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00647                                 phi_hit = phi;
00648                         }
00649                 }
00650                 std::cout<<"    => phi_hit = "<<phi_hit/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00651                 G4ThreeVector pHC_D = pIC_D;
00652                 pHC_D.setPhi(phi_hit);
00653                 hitPosition = pointIn_pos + pIC_D - pHC_D;
00654                 G4ThreeVector pHw_D = wire_pos - hitPosition;
00655                 driftD = pHw_D.mag();
00656                 G4int toTravel_derection = 0;
00657                 if ( phi_out - phi_in > 0 ) toTravel_derection = 1;
00658                 else toTravel_derection = -1;
00659                 G4double toTravel_dz = (phi_hit - phi_in)*toTravel_derection/rad * (pointIn_mom.z()/eV) / (B_amplitude/tesla) / fabs(charge) / (c_light/(m/s)) * m;
00660                 hitPosition.setZ( pointIn_pos.z() + toTravel_dz );
00661 
00662                 //rotate back
00663                 hitPosition.rotate( axis4rotate, -theta4rotate );
00664 
00665                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00666                 }
00667         }
00668 
00669         //***********************3, r = !0 && B_direction does not parallel wire******************************
00670         else{
00671                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00672                         std::cout<<"  => B_direction does not parallel wire"<<std::endl;
00673                 }
00674                 G4ThreeVector x_axis(1.,0.,0.),y_axis(0.,1.,0.),z_axis(0.,0.,1.);
00675 
00676                 //=>Step 1, Calculate helix parameters
00677                 //rotate z to B direction
00678                 G4double theta4rotate_B = B_direction.theta();
00679                 G4ThreeVector axis4rotate_B = (B_direction.cross(G4ThreeVector(0,0,1))).unit();
00680                 if (axis4rotate_B.mag() == 0){
00681                         axis4rotate_B = G4ThreeVector(0., 0., 1.);
00682                 }
00683                 G4ThreeVector pointIn_pos_B = pointIn_pos;
00684                 G4ThreeVector pointOut_pos_B = pointOut_pos;
00685                 G4ThreeVector pointIn_mom_B = pointIn_mom;
00686                 pointIn_pos_B.rotate(axis4rotate_B, theta4rotate_B);
00687                 pointOut_pos_B.rotate(axis4rotate_B, theta4rotate_B);
00688                 pointIn_mom_B.rotate(axis4rotate_B, theta4rotate_B);
00689                 //calculate l_helix
00690                 //  l_helix>0: right hand helix; l_helix<0: left hand helix;
00691                 G4double l_helix = - 2*pi*(pointIn_mom_B.z()/eV) / (c_light/(m/s)) / charge / (B_amplitude/tesla) * m;
00692                 //calculate traveled_dphi( with sign )
00693                 G4double traveled_dphi;
00694                 if ( l_helix != 0 ){
00695                         traveled_dphi = ( pointOut_pos_B.z() - pointIn_pos_B.z() ) / l_helix;
00696                 }
00697                 else {
00698                         traveled_dphi = 720 * deg;
00699                 }
00700                 //calculate r_helix( positive )
00701                 G4double r_helix = fabs( (pT/eV) / (c_light/(m/s)) / charge / (B_amplitude/tesla) ) * m;
00702 
00703                 //=>Step 2, rotate z to wire direction, y to Bxy direction and move (x=0,y=0) to wire
00704                 G4double theta4rotate_z = wire_direction.theta();
00705                 G4ThreeVector axis4rotate_z = (wire_direction.cross(G4ThreeVector(0,0,1))).unit();
00706                 if (axis4rotate_z.mag() == 0){
00707                         axis4rotate_z = G4ThreeVector(0., 0., 1.);
00708                 }
00709                 B_direction.rotate(axis4rotate_z, theta4rotate_z);
00710                 wire_pos.rotate(axis4rotate_z, theta4rotate_z);
00711                 pointIn_pos.rotate(axis4rotate_z, theta4rotate_z);
00712                 pointIn_mom.rotate(axis4rotate_z, theta4rotate_z);
00713 
00714                 G4double B_direction_phi = B_direction.phi();
00715                 if (B_direction_phi<0) B_direction_phi += 360.*deg;
00716                 G4double theta4rotate_y = 90.*deg - B_direction.phi();
00717                 B_direction.rotate(z_axis, theta4rotate_y);
00718                 wire_pos.rotate(z_axis, theta4rotate_y);
00719                 pointIn_pos.rotate(z_axis, theta4rotate_y);
00720                 pointIn_mom.rotate(z_axis, theta4rotate_y);
00721 
00722                 G4ThreeVector vec4move(wire_pos.x(),wire_pos.y(),0.);
00723                 pointIn_pos -= vec4move;
00724 
00725                 //=>Step 3, get parameters of initial state and final state
00726                 G4double theta_helix = B_direction.theta();
00727                 G4ThreeVector pTxBu_vec = pointIn_mom.cross(B_direction);
00728                 pTxBu_vec.setMag(pT);
00729                 G4ThreeVector cPI_D = - (pTxBu_vec/eV) / (B_amplitude/tesla) / charge / (c_light/(m/s)) * m;
00730                 G4double phi_in = ( cPI_D.rotate(x_axis, theta_helix) ).phi();
00731                 if (phi_in<0) phi_in += 360.*deg;
00732                 G4double phi_out = phi_in + traveled_dphi;
00733 
00734                 //=>Step 4, get parameters of the function for distance
00735                 //d(D^2/r^2)/d(phi)) = a[0] + a[1]*sin(2*phi) + a[2]*sin(phi) + a[3]*cos(phi) + a[4]*phi*cos(phi) + a[5]*phi
00736                 G4double x0 = pointIn_pos.x()/r_helix;
00737                 G4double y0 = pointIn_pos.y()/r_helix;
00738                 G4double z0 = pointIn_pos.z()/r_helix;
00739                 G4double k = l_helix/r_helix;
00740                 G4double cosPhi = cos(phi_in);
00741                 G4double sinPhi = sin(phi_in);
00742                 G4double sinTheta = sin(theta_helix);
00743                 G4double cosTheta = cos(theta_helix);
00744                 G4double A = x0- cosPhi;
00745                 G4double B = y0- sinPhi*cosTheta - k*phi_in*sinTheta;
00746                 G4double a[6];
00747                 a[0] = B*k*sinTheta;
00748                 a[1] = -sinTheta*sinTheta/2;
00749                 a[2] = k*sinTheta*cosTheta-A;
00750                 a[3] = B;
00751                 a[4] = k*sinTheta*cosTheta;
00752                 a[5] = k*k*sinTheta*sinTheta;
00753 
00754                 //=>Step 5, generate secondaries and find the closest point
00755                 G4double phi_hit = phi_in;
00756                 G4double driftD_temp = 1e10;
00757                 for ( int i = 0; i < nSec; i++ ){
00758                         G4double phi =phi_in + traveled_dphi*G4UniformRand();
00759                         G4double X = r_helix * ( cos(phi) + A );
00760                         G4double Y = r_helix * ( sin(phi)*cosTheta + k*phi*sinTheta + B );
00761                         G4double Z = r_helix * ( k*phi*cosTheta - sin(phi)*sinTheta - k*phi_in*cosTheta + z0 + sinPhi*sinTheta );
00762                         G4ThreeVector pointSec(1,1,1);
00763                         pointSec.setX(X);
00764                         pointSec.setY(Y);
00765                         pointSec.setZ(Z);
00766                         G4double driftD_temp = pointSec.rho();
00767                         if ( driftD_temp < driftD ){
00768                                 driftD = driftD_temp;
00769                                 hitPosition = pointSec;
00770                         }
00771                 }
00772 
00773                 //=>Step 6, transform it back to lab coordinate system
00774                 driftD = hitPosition.rho();
00775                 hitPosition += vec4move;
00776                 hitPosition.rotate(z_axis, -theta4rotate_y);
00777                 hitPosition.rotate(axis4rotate_z, -theta4rotate_z);
00778 
00779                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00780                         std::cout<<"    traveled_dphi = "<<traveled_dphi/deg
00781                                        <<"deg, phi_in = "<<phi_in/deg
00782                                        <<"deg, phi_out = "<<phi_out/deg
00783                                        <<"deg"<<std::endl;
00784                 }
00785         }
00786 
00787         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00788                 std::cout<<"  hitPosition(rho,phi,z):"<<hitPosition.rho()/cm<<"cm, "<<hitPosition.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<hitPosition.z()/cm<<"cm, driftD = "<<driftD/cm<<"cm"<<std::endl;
00789         }
00790 
00791         return 0;
00792 }
00793 
00794 G4double CdcIonSD::StandardDeltaAngle(G4double val){
00795         while ( val >= 180 || val < 0 ){
00796                 if ( val>=180 ) val -= 360;
00797                 if ( val < 0 ) val *= -1;
00798         }
00799         return val;
00800 }
